title: Soil Testing Kit
content: A portable kit used to measure soil pH, nitrogen, phosphorus, and potassium levels on-site to determine crop suitability and fertilizer needs.

title: AgriApp
content: A smartphone app offering crop advisory, weather forecasts, market prices, and pest control tips tailored to your region.

title: Drip Irrigation System
content: A water-saving irrigation system that delivers water directly to the root zone of crops, reducing waste and increasing efficiency.

title: Government Subsidy Portal
content: An official portal where farmers can apply for subsidies, equipment loans, and insurance schemes under national and state agriculture policies.

title: Kisan Call Center (KCC)
content: A toll-free number (1800-180-1551) that connects farmers to agricultural experts for queries on crops, pests, and farming techniques.

title: Tractor with Attachments
content: Multi-purpose farm vehicle used for plowing, sowing, and harvesting with various attachments like tillers and seeders.

title: eNAM (National Agriculture Market)
content: A digital trading platform for farmers to sell their produce directly to buyers across India, ensuring better pricing and transparency.
